descriptionSet.description: On this poster from Pheonix P. Works, a hindu woman can be seen while wearing a seemingly expensive blue Sari. Shes admiring herself in a mirror with a green curtain.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

titleSet.title: Textile label by Phoenix P. Works

hra:item.hra:value: text-en: Phoenix P. Works, AHMEDABAD.
text-en: Copy Rt. No. 652
description-en: On this poster from Pheonix P. Works, a hindu woman can be seen while wearing a seemingly expensive blue Sari. Shes admiring herself in a mirror with a green curtain. (gs)
explanatory comments/crosstagging: Images of the home in calendar art also offered women a life of leisure, with ample hours for relaxation. (Abigail McGowan)(gs)
related literature: Braudel, Fernand 1981. "The Structures of Everyday Life". London: Collins. (gs)
related literature: de Certeau, Michel 1984. "The Practices of Everyday Life" . Berkeley: University of California Press. (gs)
